summary: Get SKU stock rule by sku and warehouse
description: Get SKU stock rule by sku and warehouse

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/fbl/stock_rule/get','GET')
request.add_api_parameter("fulfillment_sku_ids", "638646125507,654069263100")
request.add_api_parameter("store_code", "OMS-LAZADA-WH3")
request.add_api_parameter("page", "1")
request.add_api_parameter("per_page", "50")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/fbl/stock_rule/get','GET')
request.add_api_param('fulfillment_sku_ids', '638646125507,654069263100')
request.add_api_param('store_code', 'OMS-LAZADA-WH3')
request.add_api_param('page', '1')
request.add_api_param('per_page', '50')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
